page.title: 13Landscape.
page.content: The landscape has amenities such as postboxes and telephone boxes.There is a memorial for those who died in the Second World War.Our area is densely crowded with terraced houses.There is an abundance of trees and a playing fields.We discovered that there are 3 pubs.Welwyn Garden City is a very busy place to live in.There are two main roads going through the area we were allocated. In our area there are terraced houses that originally belonged to the council.The houses are of an average size with 3 bedrooms.there are 4 houses that are reserved for policemen.Howlands and Cole Green Lane are the main roads running through our area.The roads are tree-lined with wide grass verges between the roadways and pathways.
